scripts.build:ui: powershell.exe Remove-Item build -recurse && cd ../phonebook_frontend && npm run build --prod && powershell.exe Copy-Item build -Recurse ../phonebook_backend
scripts.unix_build:ui: rm -rf ./build && cd ../phonebook_frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r ./build ../phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
scripts.unix_deploy:full: npm run unix_build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
